Pre-Game Insights: India is expected to secure a straightforward win, but Ireland has a reputation for staging upsets in major tournaments.
Virat Kohli has been in incredible form of late, finishing as IPL 2024 Orange Cap Player with 741 runs.
Rohit Sharma is a different player when it comes to the shortest format and can get India off to a blazing start in the powerplay.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The pitch at Nassau County International Cricket Stadium exhibits a two-paced nature, causing the ball to arrive inconsistently onto the bat compared to most T20 surfaces.
The maximum temperature is expected to be around 27°C with a 20 percent chance of rain and predicted cloud cover as well during the game.
Others: Jasprit Bumrah is a proven match-winner and the New York pitch will certainly help him bring out his best and is expected to get good fantasy points.
Kuldeep Yadav has a fine record against Ireland and will get ample assistance off the deck in New York.
Joshua Little is Ireland’s top bowler and has the ability to get breakthroughs with the new ball during the powerplay phase of the first six overs.
